 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                path="/people")

        Returns:

 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(method=GET,

 @ResponseBody

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Person> getPersonByUsername(@PathVariable(value="username")

        Finds a Person by username, if they exist.
        Parameters:
        username - username to search for
        Returns:
        Person with the username, if they exist.

      • deletePersonByUsername

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                path="/people/{username}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Person> deletePersonByUsername(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String username)
        Delete a person by a given Username
        Parameters:
        username - username to delete passed in URL
        Returns:
        username if deleted, nothing if not found, along with HTTP codes

      • addNewUserList

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                path="/people/{username}/lists")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Person> addNewUserList(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Userlist userlist)
        Creates a new list for a user
        Parameters:
        username - the user requesting the list
        userlist - List object to create
        Returns:
        The Person, complete with their new list. 404 if the person does not exist.

      • updatePerson

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                path="/people/{username}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Person> updatePerson(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                         Person person)
        Update the person at the given username with the given information. Checks for conflicts on emails and usernames.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of profile to update.
        person - Information to update with.
        Returns:
        person if update, 404 if not found, 409 if email or username conflict.

      • verifyPersonLogic

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                path="/verify")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Person> verifyPersonLogic(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                   Person person)
        Verify's a person login by their username
        Parameters:
        person - Person to check the database for (consists of Username and Password)
        Returns:
        Person if the login succeeds, 404 if no user found, 401 if incorrect password if login fails (i.e. password does not match.
